content.raw:
I have a lot of icons here hehe, check out this [summary](https://www.dropbox.com/s/5bt5rizzoi5vsec/rotateIconContrast.png).

The 1st one is the one I originally sent (the oval). The 2nd one is the 16x16 you sent me, which turned out darker than the rest of the icons, so it would be hard to get the tone right. So I made a 3rd one, resizing to 16x16 without changing the aspect ratio, and I think the tone is more consistent with the rest. [This](https://www.dropbox.com/s/ldsxd329ef1dyhx/rotate.png) is how it looks by itself.

What do you think?
content.html:
I have a lot of icons here hehe, check out this summary.

The 1st one is the one I originally sent (the oval). The 2nd one is the 16x16 you sent me, which turned out darker than the rest of the icons, so it would be hard to get the tone right. So I made a 3rd one, resizing to 16x16 without changing the aspect ratio, and I think the tone is more consistent with the rest. This is how it looks by itself.

What do you think?
